{{Wired embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DNS-323 |revision=A1 |asin=B002O0K9I2 |est_release_date=08/2006 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability= |type=NAS |fcc_id= |pwr_v=12.5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F5181 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL064M90TFIR40 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS16M16CS-6K |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1111 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=IDE Controller; Marvell; 88X7042;;1; |flags=fan |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6; |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.0.32 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''blank'' |oui_eth=00:26:5A }} {{TagLine|2-Bay Network Attached Storage Enclosure}} :[http://www.dlink.ru/ru/products/9/644.html Product page] (RU) {{•}} [https://support.dlink.com/ProductInfo.aspx?m=DNS-323 Support page] {{•}} [http://www.dlink.ru/u/faq/98/1015.html NAS Comparison]
===About D-Link DNS-323=== *[http://dns323.kood.org/forum/viewforum.php?id=3 ''D-Link DNS-323'' Forum] *[http://dns323.kood.org/start ''D-Link DNS-323'' Wiki] :*D-Link DNS-323 rev.A1 • CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F5181 @500MHz :*D-Link DNS-323 rev.B1 • CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F5182 @400MHz :*D-Link DNS-323 rev.C1 • CPU: [[Marvell]] Feroceon rev 0 [https://wiki.debian.org/InstallingDebianOn/D-Link/DNS-323 (v5l)]
===Firmware=== *[https://wiki.debian.org/InstallingDebianOn/D-Link/DNS-323 Installing Debian Linux on D-Link DNS-323 NAS] :*[http://www.cyrius.com/debian/orion/d-link/dns-323/ Debian on D-Link DNS-323 and Conceptronic CH3SNAS] *[http://sourceforge.net/projects/alt-f/ Alt-F is a free alternative firmware for the D-Link DNS-320/321/323/325] :*[https://sites.google.com/site/altfirmware/ Alt-F - Alt FW for the D-Link DNS-320/320L/321/323/325/327L]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnet.com/products/d-link-dns-323-2-bay-network-storage-enclosure/ ''D-Link DNS-323 2-Bay Network Storage Enclosure Review'' on '''C|NET''']
===[http://dns323.kood.org/start Specifications]=== {| class="wikitable sortable" cellpadding="3px" style="border: 1px solid black; border-spacing: 0px; width: 50%; text-align:center;" ! CPU | [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/press/pressNewsDisplay.do?releaseID=544 88F5181] @500MHz (Feroceon ARM) |- ! RAM | Nanya NT5DS16M16CS-6K (2x 32MB) |- ! Flash | Spansion S29GL064M90TFIR4 (8MB) |- ! LAN | [[Marvell]] 88E1111 |- ! IDE Controller | [[Marvell]] 88X7042 |- ! USB | 1x USB 2.0 |- ! Serial | 115200 8N1 TTL |- ! Firmware | 1.01 / 1.02 / 1.03 / 1.04 / 1.05 / 1.06 |- ! Bootloader | [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/u-boot-1_1_1_5181.tgz U-Boot 1.1.1] / [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/u-boot_1_7_3.tgz U-Boot 1.7.3] / [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/u-boot_1_7_3_5182.tgz U-Boot 1.7.3-5182] |- ! Kernel | [ftp://ftp.dlink.se/Products/dns-products/dns-323/drivers_firmware/DNS-323GPL.rar Linux-2.6.6] / [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/linux-2.6.12.6.tgz Linux-2.6.12.6] |- ! C library | [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/uclibc-toolchain-src-20040609.tgz uClibc 0.9.28] |- ! Busybox | [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/busybox-1.00-pre1.tgz v1.00-pre1] |- ! Samba | [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/samba-src.tgz 2.2.8a] / [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/samba-3.0.24.tgz 3.0.24] |- ! Benchmarks | DNS-323 benchmarks |- ! Cooling | 40mm fan (speed controlled) |- |}
